block.p: American League KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Agreed to terms with LHP Jimmy Gobble on a one-year contract.
National League CHICAGO CUBS--Named Peter Chase director of media relations. METS--Agreed to terms with RHP Duaner Sanchez on a one-year contract.

National Basketball Association DENVER NUGGETS--Traded G Earl Boykins, G Julius Hodge and cash to Milwaukee for G Steve Blake. PHILADELPHIA 76ERS--Waived F Chris Webber. UTAH JAZZ--Assigned G C.J. Miles to Idaho of the NBA Development League.

National Football League BUFFALO BILLS--Signed WR Chris Denney, WR Daunta Peterson and P Josh Brazen, and allocated them to NFL Europe. DENVER BRONCOS--Named Jim Bates assistant head coach of defense and Bob Slowik defensive coordinator.
